scripts.import:document-types: npm run build && node dist/documentType.js --upsert --import data\documentType.jsonl
scripts.import:document-list: npm run build && node dist/documentList.js --upsert --import data\documentLists.jsonl
scripts.import:document-list-type: npm run build && node dist/documentListType.js --upsert --import data\documentLists.jsonl
scripts.import:document: npm run build && node dist/document.js --upsert --import data\documents.jsonl
scripts.import:general-settings: npm run build && node dist/generalSettings.js --upsert --import data\general-settings.jsonl
scripts.import:discounts: npm run build && node dist/discount.js --upsert --import data\discounts.jsonl
scripts.import:categories: npm run build && node dist/category.js --upsert --import data\categories.jsonl
scripts.import:productAttributes: npm run build && node dist/productAttribute.js --upsert --import data\product-attributes.jsonl
scripts.import:productType: npm run build && node dist/productType.js --upsert --import data\product-types.jsonl
scripts.import:products: npm run build && node dist/product.js --upsert --import data\products.jsonl
scripts.clean:document: npm run build && node dist/document.js --upsert --clean data\documents.jsonl
scripts.clean:document-list: npm run build && node dist/documentList.js  --clean data\documentLists.jsonl
scripts.clean:discounts: npm run build && node dist/discount.js  --clean data\discounts.jsonl
scripts.clean:categories: npm run build && node dist/category.js  --clean data\categories.jsonl
scripts.clean:productAttributes: npm run build && node dist/productAttribute.js --clean data\product-attributes.jsonl
scripts.clean:productType: npm run build && node dist/productType.js --clean data\product-types.jsonl
scripts.clean:products: npm run build && node dist/product.js --clean data\products.jsonl
